Plot: A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.
Title: The Sitter
Actors: Jonah Hill, Max Records, Ari Graynor, J.B. Smoove
tomatoConsensus: With its recycled plot, misguided gags, and formula performance from Jonah Hill, The Sitter adds up to another disappointing entry from director David Gordon Green.
